name: Powder Hound Snowball Madness
description:
Love skiing? So do we!

Help our powder hound, Rocket, ski down a challenging black diamond trail while being chased by Dred, the evil AI Snowball machine. 

Each stage is randomly generated - no two ski runs are the same. Carve up the slope around trees, rocks, barrels, logs, tires and tumbling SNOWBALLS! 

Collect stars on the way down to receive energy and special gifts. 

Over 100 cool ski outfit combinations available to win and more to come in future updates.

Other features include:

Game Center Leaderboards
Achievements
Lifetime Stats
Protective Shield
Cool Retro SFX

Coming soon: New characters, obstacles and JUMPS!
